TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program: Asteroid Redirect Mission is Now Live!

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program: Asteroid Redirect Mission is now live and available for update through the KSP patcher or through the Steam store. Here's a look at some of the many new things you'll find in the ARM update:

This update is very SPECIAL to us and we hope you enjoy it. While you wait, mark the occasion by watching the ARM cinematic trailer.

http://youtu.be/H9fvjKVuULQ
